content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the ESL Languages website and find out which language courses interest the user. My computer executed the command and returned a list of language courses offered by EF, with links to their main content, course finder, price request, and brochure. EF offers courses in 10 languages and 50 destinations, with options for language and academic studies abroad, as well as personalized language courses for adults and professionals. \n\nIn a recent development, my computer received a command to browse the Cactus Language website, which offers over 20 languages taught in more than 120 locations all over the world. They offer general language courses for adults, professional courses for business purposes, language plus activity holidays, and summer language camps for children or teenagers. The website also includes links to their social media pages.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: According to GoAbroad's Top Travel Destinations Report for 2018, Spain is predicted to be the most popular destination for meaningful travel. Other popular destinations include China, Japan, England, France, the United States, Australia, South Korea, Italy, and Germany. The report analyzed data from 10 directories and provides regional breakdowns and destination preferences for specific types of travel activities. \n \n Links: ['Cookie Policy (https://www.goabroad.com/privacy#use-of-cookies)', ' (https://www.goabroad.com)', 'Choose Experience (https://www.goabroad.com/articles/goabroad-top-travel-destinations-report-2018)', 'Online Programs (https://www.goabroad.com/articles/goabroad-top-travel-destinations-report-2018)', 'How it Works (https://www.goabroad.com/how-it-works)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.lonelyplanet.com/", "question": "What travel destinations does Lonely Planet recommend?"}}}'}]
"""
